div.ab: Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, pp. 161-2. Ebn Alkhatib Mohd. Ebn Abdalla Chronographus to Kg of Granada wrote History of Granada & Bibliotheca Arabico Hispanae. Ebn Alkhatib Mohamad Ebn Abdalla, Chronicler to King of Granada, wrote History of Granada and Arabic-Spanish Library. & of Estepona مربيله Marbella [Sahil] باليش Vélez-Málaga Estepona Marbella Sahil Velez اسطبونه قمارش Comares [?]Vera Schalubania Salobrena

Al Algeciras is a better place than it appears from Gibraltar, There are two squares or plazas – Behind the town is an aquaduct & some gardens. On the whole however very miserable. A tolerable inn for Spain.

Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, p. 120. Mohamad Ben Alhassan ben Makhluph Alraschedi. Granatensis wrote Comt on “de arte metrica” of Kathiri ben Abdelrahman ben Alasuad Alkhazai of Corduba. Mohamad Ben Alhassan ben Makhluph Alraschedi of Granada wrote Commentary on "On the Metrical Art" of Kathiri ben Abdelrahman ben Alasuad Alkhazai of Cordoba.

Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, pp. 125-6. Salaheddin writes in Lacrymae queribundi & impatientis Amantis Thus. Me rapit elegantia et pulchritudinis amor. neque mirum nam ille viros fortes. Rapit et molles. Jam me delicias inter atque lusus perditum cernis. Salaheddin writes in The Tears of the Complaining and Impatient Lover Thus. Love of elegance [Casiri has ‘elegantiæ’] and beauty seizes me; no wonder, for it seizes strong men and the weak [Casiri has no full stop between ‘fortes’ and ‘Rapit’]. Now you see me lost among pleasures and games.
Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, p. 133. “Tot tibi sunt dotes virgo quot sydera coelo”.. Isa ben Mohamad ben Isa in Granada library. You have as many gifts, O Virgin, as there are stars in heaven.

Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, p. 135. In Hegirae ao. 588 or 1192 Xt. Margaritarum series ac Apparatus Vestis elegantis & laneae & others collected by Mohamad Ben Abdelhac Algasanita Granatensis ao Heg 571. Laudativa amatoria et moralia. In AH 588 or 1192AD. A series of pearls and an elegant woollen outfit and others collected by Mohamad Ben Abdelhac Algasanita of Granada, AH 571. Laudatory, amorous and moral.

Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, p. 136. Dhilvazratin Abi Abdala Ben Alkatib of Granata wrote history of Spanish events & his travels to Africa & return to Spain & congratulations on it. 3d day Saphari ao Heg 748AH 748.
Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, p. 144 (though mentions 51 professions). Mohamad Ben Md.Mohamad Albalisi ben Ali of Velez wrote dialogues of 50 professions.

Authors of Cordoba numberless. Gardening &c & all the sciences.
CAPITAL. COURT OF LIONS
